title: How to find a lost book - Quora

response.answer_text: You could pray ‘Dear St Anthony please come around, my book is lost and cannot be found.’ Or Ganesha is the god of wisdom, success and good luck; you could give him a shot. Or you have looked in your usual places already; try the places in your home that aren’t usual, like the spare room or under your car seats. Could have slid behind the bed.
